comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 3 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 3 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script)
 [https://wilcode.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwilcode.com%2F)
### Comment
> Dear AdGuard Support Team,
> I am writing to formally request a review and removal of my website, wilcode.com, from your "Dangerous/Phishing" blacklist (Report ID: wilcode.com).
> This website is the official professional portfolio for my web development agency, Wilcode Development. It is a static informational site used to showcase my work to potential clients.
> I believe this flag is a false positive for the following reasons:
> No Data Collection: The site does not contain login forms, registration pages, or any fields requesting sensitive user data, financial information, or credentials.
> Safe Content: The platform consists exclusively of project descriptions, images, and company contact information.
> Business Legitimacy: We are a verified development agency and do not engage in any fraudulent or deceptive activities.
> It is possible that this flag was the result of a malicious report by competitors or an automated error. I kindly ask that you re-scan the domain to verify its safety and remove the warning for your users.
> Site Details:
> URL: https://wilcode.com
> IP Address: 69.46.29.54
> Category: Phishing (Incorrectly identified)
> Thank you for your time and assistance in resolving this matter.

### Screenshots

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 3 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

please wait for next extension update,meanwhile you can add below filters in user rules
```adb
||a.trbcdn.net/lib/release/web/*/ad-sdk.js
||iptv2021.com/api/*/ads-banners$domain=russia-tv.online
russia-tv.online##.overflow-hidden:has(> div[class="h-full w-full"]:empty)
```

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 3 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 3 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: lookerstudio.google.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://lookerstudio.google.com/u/2/reporting/a0621a56-062e-44d5-82ca-858234d8d526/page/p_npsj2bh8yd/edit](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Flookerstudio.google.com%2Fu%2F2%2Freporting%2Fa0621a56-062e-44d5-82ca-858234d8d526%2Fpage%2Fp_npsj2bh8yd%2Fedit) ### Comment > El navegador Edge se cierra automáticamente o a veces pega por completo el computador y se cae la página apareciendo el mensaje de error de "STATUS_ACCESS_VIOLATION". > Sucede en cualquier página del navegador. > Creo que puede ser la extensión porque cuando la desactivo el problema no sucede y al volverla a activar comienza a pasar el error de nuevo. ``` Username: @yusep3012 ``` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/qnjz2jm51u88s40cc0kgow040ookcw42uy67z14new.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/75r6de7e9t8o4cw8wc4cc8cw000g0kcs4luwbtysis.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser Extension v5.2.700.1 MV2 System version: | `Windows 11` Browser: | Edge Tracking protection: | **General settings**:
Block trackers,
Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header

**Tracking methods**:
Self-destructing third-party cookies (2880) Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

Social widgets:
AdGuard Social Media

Security:
Online Malicious URL Blocklist

Language-specific:
AdGuard Spanish/Portuguese Filters last update: | December 21, 2025 at 09:14 Browsing Security: | enabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Other extensions used: | `AdGuard AdBlocker, File Icons for GitHub and Git, JSON Viewer, Lighthouse, Loom - Screen Recorder & Screen Capture, Picture-in-Picture Extension, React Developer Tools, Redux DevTools, Tango - Document and Auto..., Wappalyzer - Technology prof ..., YouTube NonStop` ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?product_type=ext&product_version=5.2.700.1&system_version=Windows+11&manifest_version=2&browser=edge&filters=2.3.4.9.208&browsing_security.enabled=true&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=false&stealth.enabled=true&stealth.hide_search_queries=true&stealth.DNT=true&stealth.third_party_cookies=2880&stealth.block_trackers=true&filters_last_update=2025-12-21T09%3A14%3A58)

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

<details>
<summary>Detailed description for iOS users</summary>

1. Install [**Usercripts**](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/userscripts/id1463298887) app
2. Enable **Usercripts** extension in Safari settings
	* iOS 18+: `System settings` => `Apps` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	* iOS 17 and older: `System settings` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	Find **Usercripts**, enable it and allow `On other sites` permission
4. Open the [tinyShield ](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@filteringdev/tinyshield@latest/dist/tinyShield.user.js) userscript URL in browser
5. Press the extensions icon in the address bar of Safari and select Userscripts 
6. Tap to install
7. In opened popup, scroll down and press Install button
8. Done.

</details>

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/issues).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 3 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.karaokemanekineko.jp/contact/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.karaokemanekineko.jp%2Fcontact%2F) ### Comment > カラオケまねきねこアプリについて、Adguardが起動中だと7100、7500のエラーコードが出て大概開始しない。開始する確率は10%未満。 > また、アプリ内ぽけマネを押すとカラオケ店を大きくするゲームになるが、店舗管理→設備とやるとアイテムが広告を見ると使えるが、Adguard使用中には広告がないメッセージが出て、ゲームが強制終了する。 > > Adguardを使わないとアプリ内で広告が出まくるので、改善してください。 ``` Username: @みみずくのりゅう ``` ### Screenshots

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 3 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 3 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

 [http://turkiye.gov.tr](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fturkiye.gov.tr)
### Comment
> turkiye.gov.tr website layout is broken while AdGuard DNS is enabled. The site loads as a simple text page, likely due to a false positive block on its static assets.

### Screenshots
<details>
  <summary>Screenshot 1 </summary>

  ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/of3lq7zpb1cg0gko4c84cwgsw80og08fjrs517itlc.jpg?nc=1)
</details>
<details>
  <summary>Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled</summary>

  ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/iyhaa0z5bps8ko4sk4444wwkkg80wscf4heenp8plc.jpg?nc=1)
</details>

### System configuration

Information | Value
--- | ---
AdGuard product: | AdGuard DNS
DNS setup: | not applicable
DNS server: | AdGuard DNS Non-filtering server
Browser: | Chrome

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 3 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 3 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

> “Suddenly, none of the protections are working on any websites. This started happening even though I didn’t make any changes.”

On my side, it works well with WPF driver mode. Please change from TDI to WPF.

Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 3 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

Несколько друзей тоже используют AdGuard с платной лицензией. Проверяли. > У всех пару недель назад стала проходить реклама. ``` Username: @AJ7ekceu ``` ### Screenshots

issue.title: andrewzimmern.com

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

<details>
<summary>Detailed description for iOS users</summary>

1. Install [**Usercripts**](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/userscripts/id1463298887) app
2. Enable **Usercripts** extension in Safari settings
	* iOS 18+: `System settings` => `Apps` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	* iOS 17 and older: `System settings` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	Find **Usercripts**, enable it and allow `On other sites` permission
4. Open the [tinyShield ](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@filteringdev/tinyshield@latest/dist/tinyShield.user.js) userscript URL in browser
5. Press the extensions icon in the address bar of Safari and select Userscripts 
6. Tap to install
7. In opened popup, scroll down and press Install button
8. Done.

</details>

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/issues).

issue.title: andrewzimmern.com

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

<details>
<summary>Detailed description for iOS users</summary>

1. Install [**Usercripts**](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/userscripts/id1463298887) app
2. Enable **Usercripts** extension in Safari settings
	* iOS 18+: `System settings` => `Apps` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	* iOS 17 and older: `System settings` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	Find **Usercripts**, enable it and allow `On other sites` permission
4. Open the [tinyShield ](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@filteringdev/tinyshield@latest/dist/tinyShield.user.js) userscript URL in browser
5. Press the extensions icon in the address bar of Safari and select Userscripts 
6. Tap to install
7. In opened popup, scroll down and press Install button
8. Done.

</details>

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/issues).

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=free.vpnrussia.secure.unlimited.turbo.unblock.proxy](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fplay.google.com%2Fstore%2Fapps%2Fdetails%3Fid%3Dfree.vpnrussia.secure.unlimited.turbo.unblock.proxy) ### Comment > Несколько лет пользовался днс "dns.adguard.com", всё было великолепно, в приложениях и играх из гугл плей не появлялась реклама вообще. А сегодня 5 декабря вдруг начала появляться реклама во всех приложениях, хотя днс работает, получается он хоть и активен но потерял свои возможности, в чем проблема и как это исправить? ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/cyxi24gebzwcoowc88000ssok44cwgwg2qzmzts2tk.jpg?nc=1)

comment.body:
> [@denismoldova](https://github.com/denismoldova) А можете проверить с [AdGuard для Android](https://adguard.com/ru/adguard-android/overview.html)? Если как описал здесь [#219482 (comment)](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/219482#issuecomment-3646612704) , то DNS тут не поможет.

Проверил уже, даже с ним ничего не работает. Посмотрел здесь и другие темы на форуме, смотрю и у многих людей так, видимо проблема глобальная

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 3 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.karaokemanekineko.jp/contact/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.karaokemanekineko.jp%2Fcontact%2F) ### Comment > カラオケまねきねこアプリについて、Adguardが起動中だと7100、7500のエラーコードが出て大概開始しない。開始する確率は10%未満。 > また、アプリ内ぽけマネを押すとカラオケ店を大きくするゲームになるが、店舗管理→設備とやるとアイテムが広告を見ると使えるが、Adguard使用中には広告がないメッセージが出て、ゲームが強制終了する。 > > Adguardを使わないとアプリ内で広告が出まくるので、改善してください。 ``` Username: @みみずくのりゅう ``` ### Screenshots

issue.title: github.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardBrowserExtension/issues/2663](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2FAdguardTeam%2FAdguardBrowserExtension%2Fissues%2F2663) ### Comment > Зайдите пож-та на указанный мной выше сайт, и вы увидите ещё одну проблему (AdGuard extension settings in Firefox browser are often cleared off #2663), но в моём случае это происходило и в Firefox и постоянно в течении последних дней в DuckDuckGo (приложение и Safari и Mozilla Firefox. А сегодня вдобавок не отражаются внизу сайта https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardBrowserExtension/issues/2663 ответы внизу сайта разработчиков и пользователя. > У меня же вдобавок к другим проблемам (постоянные блокировки сайтов включая Youtube и другие сайты- (до этого, с переходом на Mozilla Firefox ВСЁ РАБОТАЛО БУКВАЛЬНО НЕСКОЛЬКО ДНЕЙ ИДЕАЛЬНО, включались все сайты и в Safari и в Мозиле, в т.ч и ютюб!). Но потом... это сущий АД! Настройки вдруг исчезли в DuckDuckGo после перезагрузки с вашим обновлением, вместе с настройками в браузере Мозила, и... затем постоянно сбиваются Системные настройки сети с вашими указанными DNS. В протоколе для конфигурирования исчезает галочка с "Защищённый веб-прокси HTTPS" с вашим AdGuard DNS... query/ 5353 и постоянно ломается (переписывается сама по себе автоконфигурация прокси URL://localhost:5353/proxy.pac (сейчас... 49713/proxy.pac. И ещё имя NetBIOS меняется с NANT на цифру 192(подозреваю РОСТЕЛЕКОМ цифра!) и используется по настоящее время! Они же изменили кнфигурацию IPv6 на свою, где прописано: только в Link-local. Почта до сих-пор не работает(не настраивается при любых попытках!) в ноутбуке (на телефоне больше НЕ ПОЛЬЗУЮСЬ!- так как iCloud стал требовать оплаты за фото и видео свыше введёного им лимита за превышение и появились странные от Вас письма с подчёркнутым AdGuard без указания полного вашего адреса.Мой адрес здесь: `alleksandr.kant@me.com` не подключается! ``` Username: @bille ``` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.net/sitereports/pb17upephrkockkswc8k4g44soks4owko84x9vvkdw.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.net/sitereports/5z1hn4j3bjoc8wowcc484480g4w80wwmp5td29m91w.png?nc=1)

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 3 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
